index.title: Poshan Pandey
index.description: AI Engineer specializing in LLMs, Multi-Agent Systems, and Production ML.
index.intro: I write software, design AI systems, and explore how technology, art, and philosophy shape the way we think. As an engineer, I build across the full stack, from backend systems to frontend experiences, while focusing on how AI, automation, and multi-agent systems are reshaping both software and the future.

cogym.text: As we lean more on AI, we're losing a bit of our cognitive strength every day, so I'm building

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: A collection of work that has shaped my journey as an engineer and observer. These projects and photographs represent my exploration of AI systems, distributed architectures, and the fleeting moments worth preserving.

projects.name: DevSwarm
projects.description: Helped build and ship DevSwarm, a parallel AI coding platform enabling developers to run multiple AI assistants (Claude, Gemini, Amazon Q) concurrently across isolated Git branches. Revolutionized development workflows with HiVE (High Velocity Engineering) approach, cutting feature delivery time from 4-6 hours to under 30 minutes.
features: Parallel multi-agent orchestration across isolated Git worktrees
Real-time AI assistant comparison and branch-based development
Integrated Jira and GitHub workflows for seamless task management
MCP-driven inter-agent communication and error recovery systems

projects.name: TalentAI
projects.description: Revolutionary AI talent marketplace that matches candidates through debugging challenges rather than traditional interviews. Built with FastAPI, React, and LangGraph to create bias-free, skills-based evaluation using local LLMs and interactive skill visualization.
features: Blind resume processing with AI skill extraction in under 5 seconds
Interactive bug hunt challenges for performance-based evaluation
Real-time skill graph visualization and anonymous leaderboards
Semantic job-candidate matching with 90%+ recruiter satisfaction

projects.name: ThinkFolio
projects.description: AI-powered research paper interaction platform built with Next.js 15, enabling researchers to upload PDFs and engage in intelligent conversations with academic documents. Features streaming AI chat responses with page-specific citations using RAG architecture and pgvector for semantic understanding.
features: Streaming AI chat with uploaded research papers and real-time responses
Page-specific citation generation with document context awareness
Advanced PDF chunking and vector embeddings for semantic search
Secure user sessions with Supabase authentication and Edge runtime

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: A curated collection of thoughts that have shaped my understanding of the world. These words from philosophers, scientists, and thinkers offer perspectives on life, knowledge, and human nature.
